## Class composition by year
```{r}
ggplot(Class_yr) + 
  geom_col(aes(x = Year, y = Count), fill = "mediumseagreen") +
  
  theme_bw()
```

---

## Class composition by major
```{r}
ggplot(Majors) + 
  geom_col(aes(x = reorder(Major, Count), y = Count), fill = "mediumseagreen") +
  
  labs(x = "Major") +
  
  theme_bw()
```
